title: The Rehabilitation Co-operative Housing Society shall own these Convenience Shops and shall generate Operation and Maintenance costs for rehabilitation component through these, by way of transparent allotment and operation for which, accounting system may be prescribed by the C
clause_text: The Rehabilitation Co-operative Housing Society shall own these Convenience Shops and shall generate Operation and Maintenance costs for rehabilitation component through these, by way of transparent allotment and operation for which, accounting system may be prescribed by the C.E.O., S.R.A.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
